item.title: Why is goroutine being called a “lightweight” thread?
item.description: I was asked this question in one of my recent software engineer job interviews, and I believe I didn’t answer it as well as I would have liked, so I wanted to write this blog to re-answer it and perhaps aid someone else who is also curious about the solution.
